content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Line
Consists of two stone furnaces at:
- Furnace 1 at position(0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace 2 at position(2.0, 0.0)
Both furnaces are producing iron plates and are fueled by coal

### Copper Plate Production Line
Consists of:
- Stone furnace at position(4.0, 4.0) producing copper plates, fueled by coal

### Electronic Circuit Assembly Line
Located around position(9.5, 11.5), consists of:
- Input chest at position(6.5, 11.5) containing iron plates and copper cables
- Burner inserter at position(7.5, 11.5) moving materials from input chest to assembling machine
- Assembling machine 1 at position(9.5, 11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at position(11.5, 11.5) moving finished circuits
- Output chest at position(12.5, 11.5) storing electronic circuits

### Power Generation System
Located around position(-7.0, 24.5), consists of:
- Offshore pump at position(-9.5, 24.5)
- Pipe network carrying water
- Boiler at position(-7.0, 24.5)
- Steam engine at position(-2.5, 24.5)
- Connected to electrical network (id=24771) powering labs and other electrical devices

### Science Pack Research System
Located around position(0.5, 30.5), consists of:
- Input chest at position(0.5, 31.5) containing automation science packs
- Burner inserter at position(0.5, 30.5) feeding science packs
- Lab at position(0.5, 28.5) conducting research

ERROR TIPS

### Resource Management Errors
- Monitor coal levels in inventory - multiple instances of failing to insert coal due to empty inventory
- Ensure sufficient coal is harvested before attempting to refuel machines

### Assembly Line Issues
- Electronic circuit production stalling due to missing iron plates - ensure consistent supply of raw materials

### Power System Management
- Keep boiler fueled consistently to maintain power generation
- Monitor coal levels in boiler to prevent power interruptions

### General Tips
- Implement better resource monitoring to prevent "no ingredients" warnings in furnaces
- Consider creating dedicated coal supply lines to critical systems like boilers and furnaces
- Maintain balanced input of materials to assembly machines to prevent production bottlenecks
